casebody.data:
April 21, 1951.

No.-.

Land et al. v. Dollar et al. Attorney General McGrath for petitioners. Gregory A. Harrison and Moses Lasky for respondents.

The application for a stay of the order of the United States Court of Appeals for the District of Columbia Circuit requiring Charles Sawyer and others to show cause why they should not be adjudged in civil and criminal contempt, referred to the Court by The Chief Justice, is denied.

Mr. Justice Black and Mr. Justice Clark took no part in the consideration or decision of this application.
